verbose_text: Activation of cap dependent protein translation requires phosphorylation of eIF4E at Ser209 by the mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK)-interacting kinase MnK, which enhances the binding affinity of eIF4E to the cap structure and promotes assembly of a stable eIF4F complex.
evidence: eIF4E at Ser209 by the mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK)-interacting kinase MnK                           , which enhances the binding affinity of eIF4E to the cap structure               and promotes assembly of a stable eIF4F
